'''Javad''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Sumeru City]], [[Sumeru]]. During daytime, he can be found sitting next to a bed in [[Bimarstan]] while at night, he can be found walking right along the path leading to Bimarstan. His dialogue does not change based on time of day.

Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time gives the player one 3{{star}} [[Traveling Doctor's Medicine Pot]].

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Javad:''' Ouch...
:{{DIcon}} Are you hurting badly?
::'''Javad:''' It does hurt pretty bad, but I'm used to it.
::'''Javad:''' Even the best doctor couldn't do anything with my affliction, so I don't have any high hopes.
::'''Javad:''' Compared to griping and living in fear, it's better to be upbeat and charitable.
::{{DIcon|Reward}} Get some rest.
:::'''Javad:''' I appreciate your kindness, but life has to go on.
:::'''Javad:''' I'd trade a few years of my life for not having to drink such bitter medicines every day!
::;(Obtain 3{{star}} {{Item|Traveling Doctor's Medicine Pot}})
:{{DIcon}} Take care of yourself.
::'''Javad:''' Okay.
{{Dialogue End}}
